created_at.description: The date and time when the record was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the record was last updated.

number.description: The document number is an automatically generated number that identifies the document in the accounting system.

is_flagged.description: Indicates whether the document is flagged for review or attention.

is_locked.description: Indicates whether the document is locked and cannot be modified.

is_draft.description: Indicates whether the document is a draft. Draft documents are not yet finalized.

date.description: The date of the document. This is the date when the document was created or issued.

description.description: A brief description of the document.

contact_id.description: Contact ID associated with this document.

contact_name.description: Contact name associated with this document.

period.description: Accounting period ID to which this document belongs.

balance.description: Total balance of the document. This value represents the net effect on accounts of type "bank account." Note that this value is typically zero if no money has yet moved, for example, when recording accounts receivable. Once money is received or paid via a bank account, the amount will be shown in this field.

attachment_ids.description: List of attachment IDs associated with this document.

type.description:
The type of the document.

* `0` - Normaali kirjaus
* `3` - Arvonlis√§verokirjaus
* `4` - Poisto
* `6` - YLE-vero
* `7` - Tulovero

blueprint.description: Blueprint is an internal term for this object, based on which the actual entries are generated.

blueprint_type.description: The blueprint type is determined programmatically, and therefore this field is read-only.

import_data.description: Import data e.g. CSV or bank transaction data associated with this document.

has_ai_generated_description.description: Deprecated: Indicates whether the description of this document was generated by AI.

entry_ui_rows.description: UI rows for entries in this document, used for rendering the entry UI.

audit_trail_last_seen_at.description: Last time the user has visited this document's activity feed.

audit_trail_has_unseen_actions.description: Indicates whether there are unseen actions in the activity feed for this document.

audit_trail_last_mention_at.description: Last time the user was mentioned in the activity feed of this document.

audit_trail_last_comment_at.description: Last time the user has commented in the activity feed of this document.

tag_ids.description: List of tag IDs associated with this document.
